identificationModule.briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of ST-100 (Vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects Diagnosed With Dry Eye Disease (DED)
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-Center, Randomized, Double Masked, Vehicle Controlled Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of ST-100 (Vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects Diagnosed With Dry Eye Disease (DED)

descriptionModule.briefSummary: A Phase 3 Multi-Center, Randomized, Double Masked, Vehicle Controlled Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects Diagnosed with Dry Eye Disease (DED)

armGroups.label: ST-100-002
armGroups.description: ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Bilaterally twice daily for 7 weeks (49 days)

armGroups.label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution
armGroups.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution Bilaterally twice daily for 7 weeks (49 days)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using Schirmer's test at day 29
primaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of responders in Schirmer's test with ≥ 10mm improvement from baseline at Day 29

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of DED
secondaryOutcomes.description: Ocular Discomfort scores change from baseline at day 15 as measured by Ora Calibra Ocular Discomfort Scale

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of DED
secondaryOutcomes.description: Pain Score change from baseline at Day 15

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of DED
secondaryOutcomes.description: Blurred vision score change from baseline at day 4 as measured by OSDI

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of DED
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of responders in Schirmer's Test with ≥ 10mm improvement from baseline at day 15

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the safety and tolerability of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution
Assess the safety and tolerability of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution
Assess the safety and tolerability of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution
Assess the safety and tolerability of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution
Assess the safety and tolerability of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Fluorescein staining (Ora Calibra scale) at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8: regions: central, superior, inferior, temporal, nasal, corneal sum, conjunctival sum, and total eye score

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Lissamine green staining (Ora Calibra scale) at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8: regions: central, superior, inferior, temporal, nasal, corneal sum, conjunctival sum, and total eye score

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Tear film break-up time at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Drop comfort assessment after randomization at Visit 2, 6, and 8

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Ocular Surface Disease Index (OSDI) at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Ocular Discomfort Scale at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
otherOutcomes.description: Dry Eye Disease symptom questionnaire at Visits 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8

otherOutcomes.measure: Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
Compare the efficacy of ST-100 (vezocolmitide) Ophthalmic Solution 60 μg/ml Ophthalmic Solution to vehicle using additional measures
